name: openrouter-chrome-extension
description: OpenRouter CSV Cost Analyzer Chrome Extension

scripts.generate-icons: magick icon-pwa.png -resize 16x16 src/extension/icons/icon16.png && magick icon-pwa.png -resize 32x32 src/extension/icons/icon32.png && magick icon-pwa.png -resize 48x48 src/extension/icons/icon48.png && magick icon-pwa.png -resize 128x128 src/extension/icons/icon128.png
scripts.package: bun run build && zip -r extension.zip dist/* && mv extension.zip ~/Desktop
scripts.release: bun run build && git add . && git commit -m "Release $(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[" ,]//g')" && git push
scripts.release:tag: git tag v$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[" ,]//g') && git push --tags
